name: The Portal World
description:
The Portal World

You start your journey in a world called "The Fantasy Forest". From there on you can find and use portals to explore other worlds. But be careful - you have to go through dark scary passages when you go from one portal to another. Use your flashlight, follow the stone paths and watch out for monsters..

You can move around (locomotion) using the thumbstick on your left controller  and you turn on/off your flashlight using the button "A" on your right controller.

----

The project is a work-in-progress prototype that incorporates passthrough in Meta/Oculus headset.

---

The following assets have been used from other parties:

* Fantasy Forest Environment - Free Demo - from Unity Asset Store

* FM Polyon Japan - From Unity Asset Store

* Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack - From Unity Asset Store

* Music and Sound Effects from Storyblocks (via subscription)

* Animated Characters from Mixamo

* Anime School Girl Character by yigesun from Sketchfab
